mapper.select:
select count(*) from tb_order
and company =(select id from tb_company where name like concat('%',#{company},'%'))

select id,(select name from tb_user where account=user) user,service_name,count,order_time, service_date,cost,(select name from tb_employee where number=employee) employee, (select name from tb_company where id=company) company,(select name from tb_params where value=order_state and type='order_state') order_state,(select name from tb_params where value=pay_state and type='pay_state' ) pay_state from tb_order where id=#{arg0}
select count(*) from tb_demand where state = '待接单'

select d.id, d.user_id, u.name, d.address, d.class_service, d.service_count, d.title, d.described, d.phone, d.release_time from tb_demand d,tb_user u where d.user_id = u.account and d.state ='待接单' limit #{pageNum},#{limit}
select user_id, address, class_service, service_count, title, described, phone, release_time, state from tb_demand where id = #{value}
mapper.update: update tb_demand set state = '已接单' where id = #{value}
mapper.select: select d.user_id user,s.type_name serviceName, s.id type,d.service_count count,d.release_time orderTime, d.pay_state from tb_demand d,tb_service_type s where d.class_service = s.type_name and d.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_order(user, service_name, type, count, order_time, service_date, cost, employee, company, pay_state) values (#{user},#{serviceName},#{type},#{count},#{orderTime},#{serviceDate},#{cost},#{employee},#{company},#{payState})
mapper.select: select id paramId,type,name,value from tb_params where type='order_state'

select count(*) from tb_order where date_format(order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{date}
and company=(select id from tb_company where name like concat('%', #{company},'%'))

select count(*) from tb_order where date_format(order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{date}
and company=(select id from tb_company where name like concat('%', #{company},'%'))
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_time,'%Y年') as orderTime,sum(cost) cost,count(id) count FROM tb_order where company = #{value} GROUP BY orderTime
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_time,'%Y年%m月') as orderTime,sum(cost) cost,count(id) count FROM tb_order where company = #{value} GROUP BY orderTime
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_time,'%Y年第%u周') as orderTime,sum(cost) cost,count(id) count FROM tb_order where company = #{value} GROUP BY orderTime
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_time,'%Y年%m月%d日') as orderTime,sum(cost) cost,count(id) count FROM tb_order where company = #{value} GROUP BY orderTime
mapper.update: update tb_order set employee=#{number},service_date = #{serviceTime} where id=#{orderId}
update tb_order set order_state = (select value from tb_params where type='order_state' and name = #{stateName}) where id = #{orderId}
update tb_employee set state = (select value from tb_params where type='employee_state' and name = #{stateName}) where number = #{number}
